pageTitle: Itinerary for Monday, July 18, 2016 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Monday, July 18, 2016:

Ottawa, Ontario

12:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will visit the Embassy of France to observe a moment of silence and sign the book of condolences for the victims of the terrorist attack in Nice, France.

Embassy of France
42 Sussex Drive
Ottawa, Ontario

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity only


PMO Media Relations:
media@pmo-cpm.gc.ca
613-957-5555
